note.original: khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na maṃ tosayanti (sī. pī.)
note.snippet: Nakkhattayogaṃ paṭimānayāmi, khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ
Mā cassu me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, guyhittho atthaṃ
Imassa daṇḍañca vadhañca datvā, gale gahetvā khalayātha
Pakatimpi te attamano asaṃsiṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ taṃ

note.original: kicchā laddhaṃ jīvikaṃ appapañño (sī. syā.), kacchāpi laddhā jīvikaṃ appañña (pī.)

note.snippet: Savanena ekassa piyā bhavanti, disvā panekassa viyeti
Disvā ca sutvā ca piyā bhavanti, kaccinnu me pīyasi
Santikepi hi so dūre, yasmiṃ nāvisate
Tesaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi, dukkhaṃ guyhamataṃ
ca jaññā avisayhamattano, na te hi mayhaṃ
maṇḍo, iti no sutaṃ mante mahārāja

note.original: mahāyitvāna sambodhiṃ (sī. pī.), pahaṃsitvāna sambodhiṃ (syā.), mamāyitvāna taṃ bodhiṃ (ka.)
mālāgandhavilepanaṃ āharitvā (sī. pī.); pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi (sī. syā. pī.)
pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi (sī. syā. pī.)
disvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃ (sī. syā. pī.), disvānahaṃ pamajjeyyaṃ (cariyāpiṭakaṭṭhakathā)

note.snippet: Ahameva dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsi bālo, bhekovaraññe ahimavhāyamāno
Ime na devā na gandhabbaputtā, migā ime atthavasaṃ gatā me
Ekañca naṃ sāyamāse pacantu, ekaṃ punappātarāse

note.original: paracittena aticitto (sī. syā.), paracittena acitto (sī. aṭṭha.)
maccumupabbajanti (ka. sī. pī.), maccumupapajjanti (syā. ka.) ettha ‘‘avitakkitāpi phasso maccaṃ janaṃ upagacchantī’’ti attho
note.snippet: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca, avitakkitā maccamupabbajanti
Dukkhūpanītaṃ maccumukhā pamocayi, alīnacittaṃ taṃ migaṃ
tattheva tadā ahosi, udāhu te koci naṃ
Na cevahaṃ tattha tadā ahosiṃ, na cāpi me koci naṃ
vicikicchase tuvaṃ, hantuṃ migaṃ sarabhaṃ sahāyakaṃ
Gacchemu taṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassa, na tveva hañño mama pāṇado yo
